thread.section_title: Couture Boutique Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Couture Boutique | coutureusa.com
thread.title: Aishah

author: Aishah
title: Aishah
text: I purchased a bag through the website and was a little uncertain for a few reasons; for one I am a buyer for a luxury consignment store and two pictures can always be deceiving. I decided to take a chance because of the amazing return policy (30 days). I received my purchase today and was overwhelmed with PURE JOY!!!! Not only did my package come in the appropriate size box and packaging but was in better condition then stated on the site!!!! I can not give them a good enough recommendation. I am not only please like as peach but I will be recommending them to anyone who will listen! Thanks guys, I will be shopping with you for a long time to come! By the way my order shipped the same day it was ordered
